Package cz.cuni.mff.java.projects.posapp.plugins.tables

Class TablesModel

java.lang.Object
cz.cuni.mff.java.projects.posapp.plugins.tables.TableEventPublisher
cz.cuni.mff.java.projects.posapp.plugins.tables.TablesModel
public class TablesModel extends TableEventPublisher
Holds the table data and dispatches events upon data change to subscribed observers.

  • Constructor Details

    • TablesModel

      public TablesModel(String... operations)
      Create the model holding data about the tables. Will notify subscribed listeners to changes to the table model.
      Parameters:
      operations - events that will be subscribed to and notified.

  • Method Details

    • addTable

      public void addTable(Rectangle newTable, boolean interact)
      Create a new table and add it to the model. Model notifies observers of change in model.
      Parameters:
      newTable - Bounds of to add
      interact - whether new table is interactive

    • addTable

      public void addTable(Table newTable)
      Add an instantiated Table to the model. Use mainly when cloning an existing table. Model notifies observers of change in model.
      Parameters:
      newTable - table to add to model

    • removeTable

      public void removeTable(Table table)
      Remove a Table from the data model. Model notifies observers of change in model.
      Parameters:
      table - to be removed

    • saveTables

      public void saveTables()
      Notify observers of new tables save.

    • cloneTable

      public Table cloneTable(Table cloneMe)
      Clone the table using the Prototype pattern
      Parameters:
      cloneMe - to clone
      Returns:
      the clone

    • loadTables

      public void loadTables()
      Load existing saved tables from the database.
